title: should i wait till tmro to send in a support ticket?
body:
hello i was under the impression that the anniversary mystery skin (i already own riot kayle) and the poro icon would be rewarded to my account by the 23rd, so should i wait till tmro (the 24th) before i sent in a ticket or has riot finished sending out all the rewards and missed me :(

just wondering

replies.body: There are a lot of accounts to gift so it's going to take some time.  This isn't necessarily a case of being missed or needing to submit a ticket, but just a matter of fact that it's going to take time to gift everybody.  You can stay up to date via the [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  For now I recommend just hanging on until all of this is finished!
